templateDescriptions.split-vertical-landscape: Two screens divided by a vertical line
templateDescriptions.split-horizontal-landscape: Two screens divided by a horizontal line
templateDescriptions.split-diagonal-landscape: Two screens divided by a diagonal line
templateDescriptions.split-vertical-3-landscape: Three screens divided by vertical lines
templateDescriptions.split-horizontal-3-landscape: Three screens divided by horizontal lines
templateDescriptions.split-mixed-1-landscape: One screen on top, two screens below
templateDescriptions.split-mixed-2-landscape: One screen on the left, two screens on the right
templateDescriptions.split-vertical-4-landscape: Four screens divided by vertical lines
templateDescriptions.split-1-3-landscape: One screen on the left, three screens on the right
templateDescriptions.split-3-1-landscape: Three screens on top, one screen below
templateDescriptions.split-3-1-right-landscape: Three screens on the left, one screen on the right
templateDescriptions.split-1-3-bottom-landscape: One screen on top, three screens below
templateDescriptions.split-diagonal-cross-landscape: Four screens divided by diagonal lines in a cross shape
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-1-landscape: One large screen on the left, four screens on the right (2 top, 2 bottom)
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-2-landscape: One large screen on the right, four screens on the left (2 top, 2 bottom)
templateDescriptions.split-custom-5-3-landscape: Two screens on top, one in the middle, two screens below

screenshots.title: Screenshot Settings
screenshots.description: Configure settings for generating and processing video screenshots

screenshots.initialCountDescription: Number of screenshots to generate when first processing a video.
screenshots.pathDescription: Directory where screenshots will be saved.
screenshots.objectDetectionDescription: Enable AI-powered object detection in screenshots.
screenshots.confidenceThresholdDescription: Minimum confidence level for detected objects. Higher values reduce false positives.

audioEngine.initialization: creates audio context with correct settings

channelManagement.createNew: creates new channel with correct configuration
channelManagement.returnExisting: returns existing channel if already created
channelManagement.disconnectExisting: disconnects existing source when connecting new one

analyser.returnNull: returns null for non-existent channel analyser

surround.useMasterFormat: uses master format when enabling surround without format
surround.returnNullPosition: returns null for surround position without surround enabled
surround.returnNullLevels: returns null for channel levels without surround

edgeCases.handleNonExistent: handles operations on non-existent channels gracefully
edgeCases.alreadyEnabled: handles enabling surround when already enabled

initialization.defaultStereo: creates processor with default stereo format

position.updateGains: updates channel gains when position changes
position.returnCopy: returns a copy of position to prevent external mutation

format.sameFormat: does nothing when setting same format

channelGains.calculateCloser: calculates higher gain for closer speakers

channelOutput.returnValid: returns channel output for valid channel

formatSpecific.centerBoost: handles center channel boost when positioned front-center

cleanup.switchFormats: properly cleans up when switching formats

recommendations.highNoise: High noise detected. Consider using AI denoising for best results.

recommendations.noVoice: No voice detected. You can use more aggressive noise reduction.
